roleset.name: take a short nap
roleset.note: CATNAP-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: doze (40.4) (from catnap.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: Cognate object, mention of sleep itself (probably rare)

example.name: Sleeper only
example.text: Unable to sleep normally, she catnapped in the afternoons.

example.name: Invented example
example.text: Mary catnapped the best nap ever.
